documents.name: Privacy Policy
documents.text:
USB Memory Direct® Privacy Policy

At USB Memory Direct, we take it as our responsibility to protect every customer's personal information. This policy outlines how your information is handled and kept secure. When you send us personal information, it will be treated according to this policy.

This policy covers the USB Memory Direct corporate website and is applicable worldwide. It is possible that one of our subsidiaries will have its own policies that may be different. We advocate reading our privacy policy and those of any website you visit.

Personal Data Gathering

You will be told before we acquire any personal information from you, the purpose of which will always be apparent. The term “Personal Information” applies to any data that can be used to identify an individual, and includes, but is not limited to, name, postal or other physical address, credit or debit card information, occupation, email address, and any other data received by us in order to provide a service, deliver a product, or proceed with a transaction requested by one of our customers.

Examples of when we would collect personal information include:
  • Registration on our website(s)
  • Placement of a transaction or order with us
  • Requests for service and support of our products or services
  • Usage of certain features within our products or services
  • Participation in an online survey
  • Registration to membership programs or newsletter subscriptions
Personal Data Usage

Your personal information will only be utilized in the manner we specified when it was originally collected. It will not be used in a different manner without your knowledge and consent.

Examples of how we may use your personal information include:
  • Processing your orders and delivering the products and services requested
  • Providing support and assistance for our products and services
  • Providing current information on our latest product announcements, updates, enhancements, special offers, and other relevant information
  • Providing the ability to register a personal profile and access protected content
  • Providing customer feedback and support services
  • Meeting contractual obligations
Gathering Anonymous Data

In some cases, USB Memory Direct may retrieve non-personal (aggregate or demographic) data using such methods as cookies. This is utilized to help understand and evolve the functionality and usefulness of our website(s).

As well, by using some of our products or services, anonymous information may be sent back to us, such as technical system information about your computer. This data is sent to us so that we can understand how users interact with our products, to help improve them, and to provide communication regarding the product and any available updates or upgrades.

Personal Data and Sharing

Your personal information may be shared within USB Memory Direct or any of our subsidiaries for the purposes of data processing or storage.

Your personal information may be shared with business partners, service vendors, authorized third-party agents, or contractors in order to provide a specifically requested service or transaction. This might include processing orders, credit card transactions, website hosting, event and seminar registration, or customer support. We would only provide third parties with the absolute minimum amount of data required to complete any requested service or transaction, while the third parties involved are forbidden from using such data other than for the limited cause of following through with the requested service or transaction.

We may respond to subpoenas, court orders, or legal process by disclosing your personal information and other related information, if required. It is also possible we may opt to exercise our legal rights or defend against any legal claims.

We may share personal information and any other additional data available in order to investigate, prevent, or take action in regard to suspected illegal activities, fraud, threats to other individuals, violations of USB Memory Direct's terms of use, or as otherwise required by law.

When using USB Memory Direct's website(s) you may be directed to content or functionality that is hosted by a third-party entity. This is usually part of hosting a special event, such as contests. When your information is gathered on behalf of USB Memory Direct exclusively, our privacy policy will be referenced on the site to define how your data is used. For other, non-USB Memory Direct sites, the privacy policy of that site will be referenced. Our policy is to require that information handling from these suppliers be consistent with our privacy and security procedures.

We will never sell or rent any customer's personal information to third parties for marketing purposes unless that customer has given us express authorization to do so.

We will ask for consent by you before we use or share your personal information for any other purpose other than the reason you gave or as otherwise noted in this privacy policy. So that we may know your preferences, we require your action and responsibility, such as choosing an appropriate option, indicating your consent.

Personal Data Security

USB Memory Direct is deeply committed to the sustained security of any personal information you choose to share with us. Using a composite of industry-standard security technologies, procedures, and organizational policies, we will protect personal information from unauthorized access, usage, or disclosure.

When transferring sensitive data (for example, payment information) over the Internet, it is protected by utilizing Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) encryption.

While striving to protect all your personal information, we cannot guarantee the security of information that you send by Internet, phone, mail, or any other means of communication. It is recommended to take every measure to protect personal information from exposure while on the Internet. Be sure to change passwords often, create unique passwords, and use a secure browser with the latest updates.

Keeping Information

USB Memory Direct will not keep your personal data longer than is required to fulfill the purposes for which it was obtained or as is required by applicable laws or regulations.

Cookies

As with many sites on the Internet, USB Memory Direct utilizes technologies such as cookies, which give us the ability to make using our website(s) easier, more functional and more useful by providing you with a customizable experience that recognizes you upon return.

A cookie will not read personal data found on the hard disk or from cookies made by other websites. The only personal information a cookie keeps is that which you supply yourself to that website. If you accept our website(s) cookies, they may give us access to information about your browsing behavior, which may be utilized to personalize visits, track user traffic patterns, and merge such data once you register. This is done to determine how efficient our site is to our users and to help improve how it is navigated. Our website(s) should be able to be browsed without cookies enabled, however pages involving purchases or requiring a login and password require cookies and will not function if you have cookies disabled in your web browser.

Outside Links

The websites of USB Memory Direct and its subsidiaries may have links to third-party sites that we have no control over and are not covered by this privacy policy. It is advised to review the privacy policy of any sites you visit.

Posting Information Publicaly

Any information that you submit publicly, such as in a forum or chat room, will be available for others to see, which may possibly include individuals both internal and external to our company who visit such areas. Please be aware that these individual areas may contain additional rules and provisions. The information that individuals post in these areas is of their own opinion and should not be taken as the views of USB Memory Direct.

Personal Data Transfer

It may be necessary to transfer your personal data within our company, to one of our subsidiaries, or to third-parties acting at our behest, such as for processing orders or storage.

How to Unsubscribe

You may request to unsubscribe from our newsletters by sending a letter, including name, address, email, and the title of the marketing material to:

USB Memory Direct
Privacy Department
12349 S.W. 53rd St #205
Cooper City, FL 33330
United States

We will gladly remove your information from the requested mailing list, however we cannot prevent accidental mailings, such as may occur through multiple entries of the same information. Please allow up to 8 weeks for all mailings, online and physical, to cease.

Contact for Questions/Comments

If you have the need to contact us in regard to our privacy policy or have any questions about it, feel free to write us at privacy@usbmemorydirect.com

Revisions to this Privacy Policy

We may alter or add on to this statement of policies at any time without notice. Returning to our website(s) after such a change is made will indicate your continued agreement with any revisions.

USB Memory Direct® Terms &. Conditions Agreement With USB Memory Direct®

Additionally, the USB Memory Direct Websites, or any publications of the USB Memory Direct Websites, may contain additional terms that govern particular features or offers. In the event that any of the terms, conditions, and notices contained herein conflict with the Additional Terms or other terms and guidelines contained within any particular USB Memory Direct Website, or publications produced by any USB Memory Direct Website, then these terms shall control.

Artwork

Certain colors may look different when printed on surfaces other than paper, for example metal, wood, rubber or plastic. It is encouraged that the client submit a vector graphic in one of the following forms: AI, EPS, PS. Specialty fonts must be outlines or the font files themselves must be included with the vector file, otherwise USB Memory Direct reserves the right to substitute fonts. Please review and carefully check all digital / physical proofs. Digital proofs are not intended to verify color correctness as colors may vary based on screen view. Digital proofs should be used to assure correct size, scale, positioning, spelling, etc of the artwork on the product. In the event precise color matching is critical a physical proof is recommended. Clients may also obtain PMS color swatches from PANTONE's website. Physical proofs will accurately represent how the color will appear on the final product, color may vary slightly on the final production run. If the client requests additional changes and/or proof the order may be delayed and fees may apply. If the client delays in approving the proof the order delivery date may be affected, please contact customer service immediately to have your order expedited.

Uploads

It is the customer's responsibility to check all files and folders uploaded to our site for data corruption, or errors that may have occurred in the transfer process. We cannot accept any responsibility for errors or data corruption during the file transfer process. Once files are delivered to us, our sole responsibility is to confirm the number of files or folders, file types, and overall size of data upload as per customer's instruction.

Approval

USB Memory Direct will not begin producing any order unless the invoice, digital samples and other service requests are approved first and payment has been received. Products, services, or discounts not present on the invoice will not be given.

Payment

USB Memory Direct accepts credit cards, wire / money transfers, and purchase orders from approved companies. Orders will not be placed into production until payment is received in full or a valid purchase order is received. Credit card billing and shipping must match or the alternate shipping address must be on file with the credit card company otherwise the order may be delayed. All past-due accounts placed into collection are responsible for all associated fees and 1.5% interest compounded monthly on the balance.

Price

All quoted prices are subject to change without notice. To secure pricing a valid form of payment and approval of the final invoice must be given, at which time no items may be removed from the order. USB Memory Direct will price match any competitor pricing provided a valid quote is presented and the competitor quote is not below USB Memory Direct's cost. Additional fees may apply to artwork after order approval depending on final color count, position, size, etc of the artwork.

Returns

USB Memory Direct offers a lifetime replacement warranty. A valid RMA number is required for all returns. USB Memory Direct will not issue refunds for any custom products or service if the job is produced according to the client's artwork and specifications.

Shipping

USB Memory Direct includes UPS Ground shipping service free of charge, all other delivery methods will be billed as a line item to the invoice. USB Memory Direct will not be responsible for delays in order delivery made by any shipping provider. You agree to pay for all charges associated with package interceptions and destination changes.

All orders that are being printed or otherwise customized cannot be canceled or refunded once they are in production. USB Memory Direct reserves the right to refuse any order. Your use of this site shall be governed in all respects by the laws of the state of Florida U.S.A., without regard to choice of law provisions, and not by the 1980 U.N. Convention on contracts for the international sale of goods. You agree that jurisdiction over and venue in any legal proceeding directly or indirectly arising out of or relating to this site (including but not limited to ordering from or the purchase of USB Memory Direct products) shall be in the state or federal courts located in Florida. Any cause of action or claim you may have with respect to the site (including but not limited to the purchase of USB Memory Direct) must be commenced within one (1) year after the claim or cause of action arises. USB Memory Direct failure to insist upon or enforce strict performance of any provision of these terms and conditions shall not be construed as a waiver of any provision or right. Neither the course of conduct between the parties nor trade practice shall act to modify any of these terms and conditions. USB Memory Direct may assign its rights and duties under this Agreement to any party at any time without notice to you.
